Resume.name: Takazo
Resume.summary: I am an outgoing and energetic (ask anybody) professional, seeking a career that fits my professional skills, personality, and tendencies. I may inspire fear among those who gaze upon me; however, do not underestimate my problem solving abilities. I will bring world domination to your organization.

Skills.Office Skills: Office and records manager, databaser, eventer, customer supporter, travel coordinater
